appearance.features: freckles on nose, wears contact lenses

backstory.childhood_experience: Raised by a hardworking mother, developed a passion for art early on
backstory.significant_life_events: Won an art scholarship, first design job at a well-known agency
backstory.past_employment: Freelanced for various clients during university

values_beliefs.social_issues: Advocates for LGBTQ+ rights, mental health awareness
respected_people: Artists who break boundaries and inspire others

daily_routine.morning: Wakes up at 7:00 AM, sketches ideas, has a light breakfast
daily_routine.workday: Works from 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM, collaborates with clients, creates designs
daily_routine.evening: Attends art events, hangs out with friends, goes to bed by 12:00 AM

lifestyle.living_situation: Shares an apartment with a roommate in Tokyo
lifestyle.dream_living_environment: A loft-style apartment with an art studio, close to vibrant cultural spots

internal_conflicts: conflict between personal projects and client work

family_relationships: close with mother and sister, supportive of their endeavors
romantic_relationships: currently dating, enjoys spontaneous and creative dates
friendships: many friends from the art community, values inspiration and support
rivals_enemies: occasional rivalry with fellow designers, friendly competition
